channel.title: 华尔街日报
channel.description: 这是一个追踪华尔街日报news的种子

item.title: 陷入困境的贷款机构纽约社区银行（New York Community Bancorp）正在向包括美国前财政部长史蒂夫-姆努钦（Steve Mnuchin）在内的一批投资者筹集超过 10 亿美元的资金。
item.description:
Troubled lender New York Community Bancorp is raising more than $1 billion from a group of investors including former U.S. Treasury Secretary Steve Mnuchin https://t.co/6JmDjO2v9U https://t.co/6JmDjO2v9U

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 6, 2024

item.title: 堡垒之夜》开发商 Epic Games 声称，苹果公司终止了其开发者账户，导致该视频游戏公司无法将其游戏商店引入 iOS 设备。
item.description:
Fortnite developer Epic Games alleged that Apple had terminated its developer account, preventing the video-game company from bringing its game store to iOS devices https://t.co/duuxA0YGoI https://t.co/duuxA0YGoI

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 6, 2024

item.title: 红袜队在 2023 年排名倒数第一后，在春季训练前只签下了一名主要自由球员，而现在这名自由球员即将缺席整个赛季。
item.description:
After a last-place finish in 2023, the Red Sox signed only one major free agent before spring training—and now that free agent is about to miss the entire season https://t.co/H31QpsQSKc https://t.co/H31QpsQSKc

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 6, 2024

item.title: 来自@WSJopinion：拜登四年前获胜是因为选民们想要没有特朗普的特朗普经济。@jasonrileywsj 写道：拜登四年前获胜是因为选民想要的是没有特朗普的特朗普经济，但他没有做到这一点，如果他要获胜，他必须做的不仅仅是称对手是对民主的威胁。
item.description:
From @WSJopinion: Biden won four years ago because voters wanted the Trump economy without Trump. That’s not what he delivered, and he’ll have to do more than call his opponent a threat to democracy if he’s going to win, writes @jasonrileywsj. https://t.co/gBRE22OlDo

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 6, 2024

item.title: 西班牙禁止萨姆-奥特曼的世界币公司扫描人们的眼睛以换取加密代币，理由是担心生物识别数据的收集和处理问题
item.description:
Spain banned Sam Altman’s Worldcoin from scanning people’s eyes in exchange for cryptocurrency tokens, citing concerns over the collection and processing of biometric data https://t.co/mfbjnPb7Od https://t.co/mfbjnPb7Od

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 6, 2024

item.title: 众议员迪恩-菲利普斯表示，他将结束对拜登总统的初选挑战，并在社交媒体上写道："很明显，替代者不是我"。
item.description:
Rep. Dean Phillips says he is ending his longshot primary challenge to President Biden, writing in a social media post that “it is clear that alternative is not me” https://t.co/EUGC3i9n2S https://t.co/EUGC3i9n2S

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 6, 2024

item.title: 微软公司的一位人工智能工程师说，该公司的人工智能图像工具 Copilot Designer 生成的暴力和性图像可能会对社会造成危害。
item.description:
An artificial intelligence engineer at Microsoft said Copilot Designer, the company’s AI image tool, generated violent and sexual images that could pose a danger to society https://t.co/HWIYEEejKm https://t.co/HWIYEEejKm

item.title: 我们毁了性爱吗？五位作家提出了一个问题：在人类最亲密的行为方面，社会是否已经迷失了方向？
item.description:
Have we ruined sex? Five writers ask whether society has lost its way when it comes to the most intimate of human acts. https://t.co/9DVBQxQKOg https://t.co/9DVBQxQKOg

item.title: 美国国家运输安全委员会主席告诉立法者，波音公司没有向调查阿拉斯加航空公司今年早些时候空中爆炸事故的调查人员提供信息。
item.description:
Boeing has failed to turn over information to accident investigators probing the Alaska Airlines midair blowout earlier this year, the National Transportation Safety Board chair told lawmakers https://t.co/sZ8JJmVw6m https://t.co/sZ8JJmVw6m

item.title: 一家总部位于得克萨斯州的公司可以将您亲人的火化遗体送入轨道、深空或月球。但是，纳瓦霍部落对此表示反对。
item.description:
A Texas-based company can send your loved ones’ cremated remains into orbit, deep space or to the moon. But the Navajo Nation is pushing back. https://t.co/ZFAMu7kFrU https://t.co/ZFAMu7kFrU

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 6, 2024

item.title: 巴塞罗那椅伊姆斯休闲椅和长椅。经典，但过于夸张，被无情地淘汰，令人疲倦。是时候考虑一下这些设计师认可的、同样别致的替代品了。
item.description:
The Barcelona Chair. The Eames Lounge Chair and Ottoman. Classic, but overexposed, relentlessly knocked-off and just tired. It's time to consider one of these designer-approved, equally chic alternatives. https://t.co/tgMEsNhwNQ https://t.co/tgMEsNhwNQ

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 6, 2024

item.title: 埃及在允许货币自由浮动并提高利率数小时后，与国际货币基金组织达成协议，向该国提供 80 亿美元贷款，以出人意料地赢回外国投资者的青睐
item.description:
Egypt struck a deal with the International Monetary Fund to extend the country an $8 billion loan hours after allowing its currency to float freely and raising interest rates in a surprise bid to win back foreign investors https://t.co/DB1U2diQy9 https://t.co/DB1U2diQy9

item.title: 让高级游戏看起来很棒的芯片，如今已成为最先进的人工智能进程的关键。下面我们就来看看是什么让这些芯片如此强大和昂贵。
item.description:

item.title: 众所周知，豪宅业主会在时尚厨房、定制装饰和艺术品上挥金如土。但是，他们越来越多地将注意力和预算转向你看不到的东西：空气。

item.title: 🧵 11 个多月前，《华尔街日报》记者埃文-格什科维奇（Evan Gershkovich）在俄罗斯采访时被拘留。#我们为那些想支持他的人提供资源。
item.description:
🧵More than 11 months ago, Wall Street Journal reporter Evan Gershkovich was detained in Russia during a reporting trip.

He remains in a Moscow prison.

We’re offering resources for those who want to show their support for him. #IStandWithEvan https://t.co/ll83UMXlp5 pic.twitter.com/tLicqo5WLD

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 6, 2024

item.title: 如今，由于航空公司将个人物品列为重点保护对象，登机时甚至连您的腰包也算作行李。为了躲避新的更高的托运行李费，在把所有东西拖到登机口之前，请三思而后行。
item.description:
These days, even your fanny pack counts as a bag during boarding, as airlines put personal items in their crosshairs. Think twice before you schlep all your stuff to the gate to dodge new higher checked-bag fees. https://t.co/Ttv0WeaRhs https://t.co/Ttv0WeaRhs

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 6, 2024

item.title: 街谈巷议WeightWatchers 正寻求通过增加其临床业务（开具 Ozempic 和 Zepbound 等药物处方）的订户来扭转业务局面
item.description:
Heard on the Street: WeightWatchers is seeking to turn its business around by adding subscribers to its clinical business, which prescribes medications such as Ozempic and Zepbound https://t.co/WmEIHC59iW https://t.co/WmEIHC59iW

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 6, 2024

item.title: 很多漫画家都蜕变成了银幕明星，但没有人像凯文-哈特这样。"无论你是不是我的粉丝，你都必须尊重我所做的一切。直截了当地说，"他说。
item.description:
Lots of comics have morphed into screen stars, but there's no one like Kevin Hart. "Whether you’re a fan or not, you have to respect what I’ve done. Point-blank," he says. https://t.co/Sfn4b1ZDou https://t.co/Sfn4b1ZDou

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 6, 2024
